r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.1M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Novipro. The average
  contract duration was 0.98 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $91.5K. The longest
  contract was 3 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $325.2K.
lookup_name: 'NOVIPRO'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.1M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '32'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '6%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '132%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.5'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '193.1K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.98'
s421_mean_contract_value: '91.5K'
s425_max_duration: '3'
s422_max_contract_value: '325.2K'
---
